title: Interactive Messaging Playground
shortDescription: A real-time messaging application with interactive features and modern UI
challenge: Building a scalable real-time messaging system that handles thousands of concurrent users while maintaining low latency and providing rich interactive features.
solution: Implemented WebSocket connections with Socket.io, optimized database queries, and used React for efficient UI updates. Added features like typing indicators, message reactions, and file sharing.
